fullText:
One of my favorite CEO clients is floating possible themes for 2026 annual planning.

She loves "Anything Can Happen" as their motto.

I puked on her shoes and mine.

I was wearing flip-flops. Her shoes were expensive.

I countered with "What If?" as the possible theme.

The
